channel.title: ::vote command and ::forums command and ::comands command
channel.description:
How do i make these commands?
I need it for a 317 [pi] source please.
I have the URL's I need for them, but I already have some of them coded, but they dont work, so i need to try some new ones, please help
(Also I need the code for ::commands command)

item.title: ::vote command and ::forums command and ::comands command
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

Heres a vote:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("vote")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("URLHERE", 12000); }

Forum:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("forum")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("URLHERE", 12000); }

The guy above me has your last one.

Read full topic

item.title: ::vote command and ::forums command and ::comands command
item.dc:creator: @puffypain puffypain
item.description:
@puffypain wrote:

Most servers already have an ::info command, search “info” up into your client. You should get something like this:

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("info")) { MainHelpMenu();

Search up:

MainHelpMenus();

For my server, i get:

[code] public void MainHelpMenu() {
if (playerRights <= 4) {

        sendQuest("Info", 8144); // Title
        clearQuestInterface();
        sendQuest(----", 8145);
        sendQuest("RULES", 8147);
        sendQuest("1. GO OWN", 8148);
        sendQuest("2. No Pretending to be Chris you creep!", 8149);
        sendQuest("3. DONT SWEAR", 8150);
        sendQuest("4. No autoing", 8151);
        sendQuest("5. Dont ask for STAFF!", 8152);
        sendQuest("6. Thats it! ", 8153);
        sendQuest("::players", 8154);
        sendQuest("@whi@:@gre@:@whi@y@gre@e@whi@l@gre@l@whi@.", 8155);
        sendQuest("Enjoy!!!!!", 8156);
        sendQuest("", 8157);
        sendQuest("", 8158);
        sendQuest("Please follow RULES!", 8159);
        sendQuestSomething(8143);
        showInterface(8134);
        flushOutStream();[/code]

Change:

        } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("info")) {

Into:

        } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands")) {

Then change all of the custom text in MainHelpMenu, compile, restart server.

Read full topic
